description.narrative: 11,748 pregnant women and their new borns.

GeneralNeonatal mortality in Zimbabwe increased from 24 (in 1994) to 31 deaths per 1,000 live births (in 2010/11) and maternal mortality rose from 350 (in 1999) to 960 deaths per 100,000 live births (in 2010/11). Zimbabwe is currently developing an Mobile-Health strategy. The draft already recognizes the importance of electronic and mobile technology in reducing maternal and perinatal mortality. Neonatal mortality in Zimbabwe increased from 24 (in 1994) to 31 deaths per 1,000 live births (in 2010/11) and maternal mortality rose from 350 (in 1999) to 960 deaths per 100,000 live births (in 2010/11). Zimbabwe is currently developing an Mobile-Health strategy. The draft already recognizes the importance of electronic and mobile technology in reducing maternal and perinatal mortalit

Overall Purpose: The overall purpose of the initiative is to strengthen monitoring of labour and provision of real- time observations, to improve quality and regularity of observations to the mother and fetus during the intrapartum period and indeed address the 3rd delay in Chipinge, Chiredzi and Uzumba Maramba Pfungwe (UMP) districts of Zimbabwe during the period March April 2017 – March 2018 Objective 1: To develop the electronic partograph Objective 2: To build capacity of health workers in 40 health facilities in using electronic partograph to provide quality intrapartum care to the mother and the fetus Chipinge and Chiredzi and UMP districts and Objective 3: To increase tracking utilization of the partograph as a quality record of care provision in maternity units of 40 health facilities in Chipinge and Chiredzi districts or Uzumba Maramba Pfungwe districts.

mailing-address.narrative: Grote Marktstraat 45, Den Haag, Zuid Holland, 2511 BH

description.narrative: Number of people benefitting directly or indirectly from activities or services established/enabled/improved within a Cordaid Health project/programme
